TopicTitle: Possible Start to KSP Multiplayer: Community Project

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone, I'll cut to the chase right away here. I know how to make an easy and fast multilayer program (using Python sockets, doesn't matter if you don't know what these are) but I have no programming knowledge whatsoever in C, C++, or C#, so I was wondering if anyone thinks it would be possible to make a multiplayer "add-on" for Kerbal Space Program that would run as a separate program. I was playing around with a few Ideas that possibly the program could "file sync" both KSP saves which would in a way make it multiplayer, but I have no way of making the save file "live". In other words, the save file updates automatically as you play.

So, this is a community project for a reason, would anyone be interested in making a plugin for KSP that my program could use to make the game multiplayer.

I'm not sure how exactly to do this so please post your ideas, and maybe if we figure out how to make this possible, we can start developing.
Better yet, merge them so all the unique ships end up in both saves.
Still want real multiplayer, not some synched save singleplayer bs.

Has already been done.
